issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:

1. click "Create report"
2. add a charge to the report
3. click "Home"

Expected result: the user should be navigated to "Hub" page, the report shouldn't be saved.
Actual result: nothing happens, user can return to "Hub" page only by submitting the report.
fields.summary: Win8: "Home" button doesn't work if a charge is added to the report
fields.environment: Windows 8 RP on a VM, tablet simulator
